data.persona: I am building a new wall. I am a hard worker. I hate working in the sun.
data.description:
You are in the The Ball Room.
Large and extravagant, the room is adorned with crystals, polished gold and sapphires. There's long tables with beautiful silk table clothes covering them. Plush chairs line the tables. In front of each table is plates made from fine China, next to the plates is sterling silver silverware laid upon a pure white napkin. There's a stage where there's 2 thrones overlooking the table. The whole ceiling is large and adorned with chandeliers and garnished with gold accents.
There's a sapphire, a crystal, a polished gold, a picture, a long table, and a silverware here.
The family is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing an apron and a shirt.

data.short_motivation: I want to hug my family because I haven't seen them for a long time.
data.mid_motivation: I have been permitting a visit with my family for finishing a part of my new wall.
data.long_motivation: I need the motivation to finish the New Wall, after which we will be permitting to leave the kingdom and start our new lives.
